summary: This Makefile is responsible for building and executing the Python script "test_control.py". It first compiles the script using a template, then runs the compiled version with Python interpreter.

details.comment: This Makefile is responsible for building and executing the Python script "test_control.py". It first compiles the script using a template, then runs the compiled version with Python interpreter.
details.content:
main: test_control.py
	${PYTHON} test_control.py
test_control.py: test_control.py.j2 $(addprefix ../, ${RENDERED_CODE})
	${PYTHON} ../render_python_code.py test_control.py
